name: Ashnod
oracle_text: Whenever a creature deals damage to you, destroy it.
flavor_text: Ashnod served as Mishra's confidante while he led Fallaji weapons development before the Brothers' War. Whereas Mishra works in metals and stone, however, Ashnod works in living flesh. She sees all living things as prototype machines; her "improvements" to them make her as feared by allies as by enemies.

name: Barrin
oracle_text: Sacrifice a permanent: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: An old and powerful wizard living on the mysterious isle of Tolaria, Barrin is the teacher who trained the young Ertai. He is also Hanna's father, but for reasons known only to the two of them neither acknowledges the other—or their strained relationship.

name: Crovax
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control deals damage to a creature or player, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: How does one escape a curse? For Crovax, a wealthy noble, the answer may lie in joining the crew of the Weatherlight as they seek to rescue their abducted captain Sisay.  Secretly, he hopes in his journeys to find Selenia, the angelic being who abandoned him and his family years ago.

name: Eladamri
oracle_text: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature you control is dealt to you instead.
flavor_text: Proud, shrewd, and charismatic, Eladamri has a commitment to his people that is absolute. The guerilla war he wages against Volrath has convinced him that the only way to liberate the Skyshroud elves is to lead all Rath's refugees to freedom. So be it.

name: Ertai
oracle_text: Creatures you control have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: After serving his apprenticeship under Barrin of Tolaria, Ertai graced the Weatherlight crew with his presence as the ship's "resident" wizard. He realizes that few recognize his greatness—but then how could they, when they lack his insight and wisdom?

name: Gerrard
oracle_text: At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card.
flavor_text: Soldier. Adventurer. Heir to the Legacy. Gerrard has, over the years, traveled much of Dominaria in search of fortune and glory. Now, after serving nobly in the Benalish army, he has returned to the Weatherlight to serve as captain in Sisay's absence and to take up the battle against the Lord of the Wastes.

name: Gix
oracle_text: {3}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Through ruthlessness and raw ambition, Gix rose through the Phyrexian regime to the exalted rank of praetor. Even while overseeing many of Phyrexia's most important undertakings, Gix continues his own quest for supremacy . . . for in Phyrexia, the weak become fodder for the strong.

name: Greven il-Vec
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control deals damage to a creature, destroy the other creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text: As a ruthless leader for Volrath, Greven il-Vec serves his lord by commanding the flying ship Predator. Greven has attained his powerful rank through a series of underhanded schemes and assassinations, the majority of which were blessed by Volrath himself.

name: Hanna
oracle_text: Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: Educated in Argive and highly knowledgeable in the field of artifacts, this expert navigator of the Weatherlight believes that scholarship does not necessarily lead to understanding. Her diligence in pursuing both is her greatest asset.

name: Karn
oracle_text: Each noncreature artifact you control is an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost.
flavor_text: Both part of the Legacy and an individual in his own right, the silver golem Karn is haunted by a single, terrible incident: while serving to protect the young Gerrard, Karn accidentally took the life of another. Wakened from years spent as a statue, the golem has vowed to never kill again as he rejoins Gerrard.

name: Lyna
oracle_text: Creatures you control have shadow. (They can block and be blocked only by creatures with shadow.)
flavor_text: One of the few Soltari who can cross the shadow barrier, Lyna serves as an emissary to the outside world. A quick thinker and convincing speaker, she does whatever she can to lead her people out of the shadows and into substance.

name: Maraxus
flavor_text: Too chaotic for even the other warlords of Keld, Maraxus has devoted himself to serving as a hired killer for the sinister Volrath. A man fond of his work, he's more than willing to put in those extra hours needed to perfect his craft.

name: Mirri
oracle_text: If a basic land you control is tapped for mana, it produces mana of a color of your choice instead of any other type.
flavor_text: Mirri and Gerrard have been the best of friends since they trained together under the maro-sorcerer Multani. A fierce and agile warrior, she rejoined Gerrard aboard the Weatherlight as his unofficial first mate shortly after he assumed command of the flying ship.

name: Mishra
oracle_text: If a creature you control would deal damage, it deals double that damage instead.
flavor_text: Both complement and antithesis to his older brother Urza, Mishra also mastered the intricacies of artifice. It was Mishra's strength that first gave rise to the massive Phyrexian war engines on Dominaria, and it was his weakness that pushed him, Urza, and Dominaria itself to the point of annihilation.

name: Multani
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +X/+0, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
flavor_text: In mentoring apprentice mages, the forest spirit Multani teaches each to respect nature while making use of its gifts. Multani taught Gerrard, Mirri, and Rofellos to hone their spellcasting in tandem with more physical disciplines so that both would be improved.

name: Oracle
oracle_text: {0}: Untap target attacking creature you control and remove it from combat.
flavor_text: Known simply by her title, Oracle uses her gift of prophecy to aid her people. She believes Gerrard to be the Korvecdal, the one who will unite the people of Rath against Volrath's tyranny. Her only doubt is whether she will be strong enough to guide him to his destiny.

name: Orim
flavor_text: Trained in the Samite arts, Orim serves as the healer aboard the Weatherlight. She is quick with languages and was educated at the same Argivian university as Hanna. A student by nature, Orim keeps a diary of all her new discoveries—both physical and spiritual—during her travels.

name: Rofellos
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control dies, draw a card.
flavor_text: Gerrard's longtime friend and fellow student under the maro-sorcerer Multani, Rofellos is an excellent warrior and excellent company. Though adept at both magic and swordplay, he's far more comfortable with a flagon in his hand and a good companion at his side.

name: Selenia
flavor_text: Once a guardian of Crovax's estate, Selenia was freed from her magical bindings by the wealthy noble. Instead of remaining at his side, the angel chose to venture out into the world. For reasons unknown to Crovax, Selenia now serves the evil Volrath in his home realm of Rath.

name: Serra
flavor_text: Named for a benevolent goddess at birth, Serra fulfilled the prophecy of that goddess's coming. As a planeswalker, she embodies white mana and helps whole civilizations develop while both directly and indirectly inspiring countless individuals to be steadfast and strong in the service of light.

name: Sidar Kondo
oracle_text: {3}: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Kondo served as guardian to the infant Gerrard and raised him alongside his own son, Vuel. He taught both boys to be strong and to lead, but whereas Gerrard became a champion of honor, Vuel's bitterness led him to become an equally devastating force of malice.

name: Sisay
oracle_text: Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.
flavor_text: While captain of the Weatherlight, Sisay undertook a quest for the Legacy, a collection of artifacts needed to defeat the Lord of the Wastes. She continued this quest even when Gerrard, heir to the Legacy, chose to abandon it. Sisay is devoted to the cause of good at whatever price.

name: Sliver Queen, Brood Mother
oracle_text: {3}: Create a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token.
flavor_text: Though long held captive beneath Volrath's stronghold, the sliver queen is actually freer than most of Rath's denizens. Her maternal instincts always take precedence—even when they conflict with the evincar's agenda—and through her numerous litters, she ranges across all of Rath.

name: Squee
oracle_text: Your opponents play with their hands revealed.
flavor_text: The smartest—and only—goblin cabin boy aboard the Weatherlight, Squee has learned that intelligence and common sense are very different things. This matters little, however, since he has neither. Fortunately, he doesn't know what he's missing.

name: Starke
oracle_text: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw an additional card. If you do, put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library.
flavor_text: Starke believes in situational ethics—the situation determines the ethics. He's switched sides so often that he has become everyone's ally yet no one's friend. This former merchant of Rath accompanies the Weatherlight crew on their journey to his home world.

name: Tahngarth
flavor_text: Tahngarth, first mate of the Weatherlight under Sisay, knows that there are really only two forms of life: the ugly ones and the minotaurs. A narcissist, he considers the condition of his hide as important as the accuracy of his blade.

name: Takara
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Takara deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Takara banishes the shadow of her father's ignoble reputation through the dedication, plain speaking, and swift action of a warrior. By refusing Starke's path of self-interest and opportunism, she has learned what he never will know: the value of sacrifice for a worthy cause.

name: Tawnos
oracle_text: You may cast artifact, creature, and enchantment spells as though they had flash.
flavor_text: Tawnos brings a childlike wonder and an inherent skill to Urza's studio and bridges the wizardry of the workshop with the grandeur of the royal court. His speed and flexibility quickly earned him promotion from apprentice to master artificer.

name: Titania
oracle_text: You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
flavor_text: Voice of the Argoth forest, defender of its creatures, and enforcer of its laws, Titania is literally an aspect of the forest itself. Her power and her very existence are linked to the land: when the forest is healthy, Titania is ascendant. When Argoth suffers, Titania also bleeds.

name: Urza
oracle_text: {3}: Urza deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: An artificer of unparalleled renown, Urza was a powerful cipher even before he was able to planeswalk. Seeing the world as a large, integrated machine is his greatest strength and weakness, enabling him to solve almost any problem but blinding him to his solutions' effects on others.

name: Volrath
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may put it on top of your library.
flavor_text: The son of Gerrard's surrogate father, Sidar Kondo, Volrath stole Gerrard's Legacy and rose to power selling it off piece by piece. Now, he is an evincar, or agent, of the Lord of the Wastes. Armed with exceptional magical powers, he plots to conquer the entire multiverse.

name: Xantcha
oracle_text: Sacrifice a permanent: Regenerate target creature.
flavor_text: A Phyrexian "sleeper agent," Xantcha has developed an inviolate sense of self. This aberration earned her a death sentence, but she was rescued by Urza and joined his crusade. Her Phyrexian credo of "Waste not, want not" has helped Urza more than even he comprehends.

name: Serra Angel Avatar
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell, you gain 2 life.

name: Serra Angel Avatar
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell, you gain 2 life.

name: Stalking Tiger Avatar
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

name: Birds of Paradise Avatar
oracle_text: Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

name: Birds of Paradise Avatar
oracle_text: Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

name: Fallen Angel Avatar
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control dies, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

name: Flametongue Kavu Avatar
oracle_text: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature deals X damage to target creature, where X is a number chosen at random from 0 to 4.
flavor_text: Awarded in celebration of the second birthday of Magic Online

name: Prodigal Sorcerer Avatar
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.

name: Prodigal Sorcerer Avatar
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.

name: Erhnam Djinn Avatar
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

name: Erhnam Djinn Avatar
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

name: Grinning Demon Avatar
oracle_text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, target opponent discards a card.

name: Grinning Demon Avatar
oracle_text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, target opponent discards a card.

name: Phage the Untouchable Avatar
oracle_text: Pay 1 life: Until end of turn, whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, destroy that creature.
Pay 1 life: Until end of turn, whenever target creature you control deals combat damage to a creature, destroy the damaged creature.

name: Akroma, Angel of Wrath Avatar
oracle_text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, it gains two abilities chosen at random from flying, first strike, trample, haste, protection from black, protection from red, and vigilance.

name: Karona, False God Avatar
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, exchange control of a permanent you control chosen at random and a permanent target opponent controls chosen at random.

name: Two-Headed Giant of Foriys Avatar
oracle_text: Creatures you control have menace. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Each creature you control can block an additional creature each combat.
flavor_text: Awarded in celebration of the first birthday of Magic Online

name: Elvish Champion Avatar
oracle_text: You begin the game with a 1/1 green Elf creature token on the battlefield. It has "{T}: Add {G}."

name: Royal Assassin Avatar
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

name: Royal Assassin Avatar
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

name: Bosh, Iron Golem Avatar
oracle_text: {X}, Sacrifice an artifact with converted mana cost X: Bosh, Iron Golem Avatar deals X damage to any target.

name: Platinum Angel Avatar
oracle_text: If you control an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a land, you can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

name: Platinum Angel Avatar
oracle_text: If you control an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a land, you can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

name: Viridian Zealot Avatar
oracle_text: {2}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Search your library for a card with the same name as the sacrificed creature, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

name: Arcbound Overseer Avatar
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on target permanent you control.

name: Raksha Golden Cub Avatar
oracle_text: Equipped creatures you control get +1/+0 and have first strike.

name: Etched Oracle Avatar
oracle_text: You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay the mana cost for spells that you cast.

name: Eight-and-a-Half-Tails Avatar
oracle_text: {1}: Until end of turn, target permanent you control gains protection from a color chosen at random from colors it doesn't have protection from.

name: Seshiro the Anointed Avatar
oracle_text: At the beginning of the game, choose a creature type. Creatures you control, creature spells you control, and creature cards you own in any zone other than the battlefield or the stack have the chosen type in addition to their other types.

name: Higure, the Still Wind Avatar
oracle_text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, choose a creature card at random from your library, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

name: Ink-Eyes, Servant of Oni Avatar
oracle_text: At the beginning of the game, look at target opponent's hand and choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
{X}, Pay X life: Put target creature card with converted mana cost X from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

name: Sakashima the Impostor Avatar
oracle_text: {2}: Choose a creature you control. It becomes a copy of target creature except for its name.

name: Oni of Wild Places Avatar
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

name: Hell's Caretaker Avatar
oracle_text: {3}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Maro Avatar
oracle_text: Tap an untapped creature you control, Discard a card: Target creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

name: Frenetic Efreet Avatar
oracle_text: Each permanent you control has phasing. (It phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)
At the beginning of your end step, flip a coin. If you win the flip, take an extra turn after this one.

name: Loxodon Hierarch Avatar
oracle_text: Sacrifice a permanent: Regenerate target creature you control.

name: Sisters of Stone Death Avatar
oracle_text: Each creature you control must be blocked if able.
{4}: Exile target creature that's blocking a creature you control.

name: Rumbling Slum Avatar
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Rumbling Slum Avatar deals 1 damage to each opponent.

name: Teysa, Orzhov Scion Avatar
oracle_text: Whenever a nontoken creature dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

name: Nekrataal Avatar
oracle_text: Creature spells you cast cost {B} less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay.

name: Chronatog Avatar
oracle_text: You have no maximum hand size.
{0}: Draw three cards. You skip your next turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

name: Lyzolda, the Blood Witch Avatar
oracle_text: Hellbent — As long as you have no cards in hand, if a source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.
Hellbent — At the beginning of your end step, if you have no cards in hand, each of your opponents discards a card.

name: Momir Vig, Simic Visionary Avatar
oracle_text: {X}, Discard a card: Create a token that's a copy of a creature card with converted mana cost X chosen at random. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery and only once each turn.

name: Haakon, Stromgald Scourge Avatar
oracle_text: Pay 1 life: You may play target creature card in your graveyard this turn.
Whenever you play a creature card from your graveyard, it becomes a black Zombie Knight.
If a Zombie Knight would be put into your graveyard from the battlefield, exile it instead.

name: Diamond Faerie Avatar
oracle_text: {S}: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Jaya Ballard Avatar
oracle_text: {X}: Jaya Ballard Avatar deals an amount of damage chosen at random from 0 to X to any target. Activate this ability only once each turn.

name: Stuffy Doll Avatar
oracle_text: {0}: If damage would be dealt to you this turn by a source of your choice, prevent that damage. Stuffy Doll Avatar deals damage to you and target opponent or planeswalker equal to half the damage prevented this way, rounded up. Activate this ability only once each turn.

name: Braids, Conjurer Adept Avatar
oracle_text: {2}: Each player may put a land card from their hand onto the battlefield tapped.
{3}: Each player may put a noncreature artifact card from their hand onto the battlefield.
{4}: Each player may put a creature card from their hand onto the battlefield. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: Mirri the Cursed Avatar
oracle_text: Creatures you control have "{T}: Another target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature."

name: Heartwood Storyteller Avatar
oracle_text: The first creature spell you cast each turn costs {1} less to cast.
The first noncreature spell each opponent casts each turn costs {1} more to cast.

name: Jhoira of the Ghitu Avatar
oracle_text: {3}, Discard a card: Copy three instant cards chosen at random. You may cast one of the copies without paying its mana cost.
{3}, Discard a card: Copy three sorcery cards chosen at random. You may cast one of the copies without paying its mana cost. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: Arcanis, the Omnipotent Avatar
oracle_text: {X}, Return a creature you control with converted mana cost X to its owner's hand: Draw a number of cards chosen at random between 0 and X. X can't be 0.

name: Squee, Goblin Nabob Avatar
oracle_text: {1}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature you control this turn.

name: Dakkon Blackblade Avatar
oracle_text: You may play any colored card from your hand as a copy of a basic land card chosen at random that can produce mana of one of the card's colors.

name: Ashling the Pilgrim Avatar
oracle_text: {2}: Ashling the Pilgrim Avatar deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

name: Mirror Entity Avatar
oracle_text: {X}: Choose a creature type. Until end of turn, creatures you control of the chosen type have base power and toughness X/X and gain all creature types.

name: Peacekeeper Avatar
oracle_text: {3}: For each opponent who controls a creature, create a token that's a copy of a card named Arrest and attach it to a creature that player controls chosen at random.

name: Morinfen Avatar
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life for each permanent you control.

name: Stonehewer Giant Avatar
oracle_text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, create a token that's a copy of a random Equipment card with converted mana cost less than that creature's converted mana cost. Attach that Equipment to that creature.

name: Maralen of the Mornsong Avatar
oracle_text: At the beginning of the game, you may pay any amount of life.

At the beginning of your draw step, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the amount of life paid with Maralen of the Mornsong Avatar. Put one of them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Reaper King Avatar
oracle_text: Each creature you control gets +1/+1 for each of its colors.

name: Murderous Redcap Avatar
oracle_text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control with a counter on it, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to any target.

name: Ashling, the Extinguisher Avatar
oracle_text: {5}: Destroy all nonland permanents. Activate this ability only once and only during your turn.

name: Figure of Destiny Avatar
oracle_text: {X}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature with fewer than X +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Necropotence Avatar
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, if it's not the first turn of the game, put a death counter on Necropotence Avatar. You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of death counters on Necropotence Avatar.

name: Orcish Squatters Avatar
oracle_text: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, add {C} for each land target opponent controls.

name: Rith, the Awakener Avatar
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {5}. If you do, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.

name: Rith, the Awakener Avatar
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {5}. If you do, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.

name: Mayael the Anima Avatar
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card with power 5 or greater, put it into your hand. Otherwise, you may put it on the bottom of your library.

name: Kresh the Bloodbraided Avatar
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control is devoured, create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is the devoured creature's power.

name: Eladamri, Lord of Leaves Avatar
oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's precombat main phase, that player adds {G}{G}.

name: Tradewind Rider Avatar
oracle_text: {3}: Each player returns a permanent they control to its owner's hand unless they pay 2 life.

name: Tradewind Rider Avatar
oracle_text: {3}: Each player returns a permanent they control to its owner's hand unless they pay 2 life.

name: Malfegor Avatar
oracle_text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if it was unearthed, it gets +3/+0.
Whenever a creature you control is exiled, if it was unearthed, shuffle that card into its owner's library.

name: Maelstrom Archangel Avatar
oracle_text: At end of combat, for each creature you controlled at the time it dealt combat damage to a player this turn, copy a random card with the same mana cost as that creature. You may pay {3}. If you do, choose one of those copies. If a copy of a permanent card is chosen, you may create a token that's a copy of that card. If a copy of an instant or sorcery card is chosen, you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

name: Sliver Queen Avatar
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a non-Sliver creature spell, exile that spell. If you do, create a token that's a copy of a random non-Shapeshifter Sliver creature card with the same converted mana cost as that spell.

name: Hermit Druid Avatar
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a land card from your library chosen at random onto the battlefield.

name: Dauntless Escort Avatar
oracle_text: Creatures you control have exalted. (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each instance of exalted among permanents you control.)

name: Enigma Sphinx Avatar
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a colored artifact spell for the first time each turn, search your library for a colored artifact card chosen at random whose converted mana cost is less than that spell's converted mana cost. You may play that card without paying its mana cost. If you don't, put that card on the bottom of your library.

name: Master of the Wild Hunt Avatar
oracle_text: {2}{G}: Create a green creature token that's a 2/2 Wolf, a 2/3 Antelope with forestwalk, a 3/2 Cat with shroud, or a 4/4 Rhino with trample, chosen at random.

name: Vampire Nocturnus Avatar
oracle_text: Play with the top card of your library revealed.
As long as the top card of your library is black, black creatures you control get +2/+1.
